Summary PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  
Over 20 years in marketing and sales, product management, project management and technical sales support with leading edge companies. Extensive sales/marketing experience including customer relationship building, customer demonstrations, proposal development, reseller channel development, and development of channel marketing programs. Extensive technical background with numerous industry and product certifications. A team player and self-starter with strong organizational, verbal, written, and interpersonal skills. Highly developed technical, relational and conceptual skills. Have received numerous job performance awards. 
 
OBJECTIVE: 
To utilize extensive marketing and sales, project management, technical, organizational and people skills in a fast paced team environment that demands quality and timely results and rewards innovation, dedication and expertise. 
 
SPECIALTIES:

Senior Director Technology - Systems Engineering Equifax April 2012  –  June 2013  (1 year 3 months) Management and design responsibility for global platform engineering. Midrange Systems Engineer Equifax May 2009  –  March 2012  (2 years 11 months) Midrange systems engineering management and design 
 
Design and implement midrange UNIX solutions. 
Converted IBM pSeries servers install base to a virtualized server environment using PowerVM, PowerHA, and AIX V6 capabilities on Power7 servers. Designed server mobility using Live Partition Mobility and Workload Partition Mobility. 
 
Design vSphere solutions running on HP x86 servers, both rack mounted servers and blade chassis, in a fully virtualized environment. VMs include RedHat Enterprise Linux. 
 
Designs also include virtualized SAN using Hitachi VSP and USPV storage, along with Brocade SAN components. Network components include virtual Port Channel configurations using the Cisco Nexus product line for distribution and access layer. 
 
Solutions include typical 3 tier role of web - application - database. Other solutions include customer network appliance solutions, eg Axway Tumbleweed secure FTP components. Senior Software Engineer & Certified IT Specialist IBM Corporation January 2009  – Present (6 years 8 months) World Wide PureApplication System Support Team Lead. 
Based on my experience and DataPower technical leadership success, I was asked to lead the 14 member WW support team for the new PureApplication System product– an innovative private cloud computing system in a rack. 
My team consisted of technical specialists located in North America; Taiwan; and Germany.  
 
In June 2012, because of my leadership and technical skills, I was asked to expand my role to help the PureApplication System Test Team meet aggressive quality and function goals.

Formerly World Wide DataPower B2B Gateway Support Team Lead. Senior Solution Architect IBM Corporation January 2000  –  December 2008  (9 years) As the DataPower worldwide Partner Enablement team lead, I was responsible for providing technical support and service to many partners and clients. 
 
I provided technical consulting to partners on the use of the IBM voice products. I established the processes necessary to create IBM approved voice solutions. I led Cisco, Nortel, Avaya, and Intervoice projects resulting in four new partner solutions using IBM voice technology. I trained many specialists in the use of IBM voice technology and tooling. 
 
I was responsible for advising global system integrators to adopt and design solutions using IBM's suite of Pervasive wireless offerings. I was responsible for advising global system integrators to adopt and design solutions using IBM's suite of Pervasive wireless offerings. Advisory Engineer IBM Corporation December 1997  –  December 1999  (2 years 1 month) I managed many business partner accounts to promote the sale of IBM Intel based servers. In addition, as the department equipment coordinator, I had responsibility for budgeting and ordering preproduction equipment Advisory Engineer IBM Corporation December 1997  –  December 1999  (2 years 1 month) I managed many business partner accounts to promote the sale of IBM Intel based servers.
